function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 in health club facilities","Impact":"Risk of contagion and transmission of COVID-19 among members, trainers, staff, and athletes","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict health and safety protocols, vaccination, regular testing, and ventilation systems","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, contactless systems, air purification systems","People":"Members, trainers, staff, athletes","Owner":"Health club organizations"},{"Description":"Disruptions caused by COVID-19 impact's anonymity","Impact":"Financial strain, operational challenges, and strategic reconsideration","Mitigation":"Adaptation of operational and expansive strategies, development of specific safe and healthy criteria for reopening, economic balance","Technologies":"Contactless systems, online services, digital marketing","People":"Health club organizations, sports authorities","Owner":"Health club organizations, sports authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of sustainable management of facility functions","Impact":"Inability to maintain a healthy indoor environment and support services","Mitigation":"Documentation of performance criteria, regular performance assessment, integration of sustainable management practices","Technologies":"Performance assessment tools, indoor air quality monitoring systems","People":"Health club organizations, facility managers","Owner":"Health club organizations, facility managers"}]}
